data.eml:eml: A new Platambus from Sichuan, with new records of species of the P. sawadai group from China (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae: Agabinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hájek, Jiří, Zhang, Tao (2019): A new Platambus from Sichuan, with new records of species of the P. sawadai group from China (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae: Agabinae). Zootaxa 4612 (4): 533-543, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.4.5
